definitions.text: (boxing) the act of one boxer holding onto the other to avoid being hit and to rest momentarily
a small slip noose made with seizing
the flattened part of a nail or bolt or rivet
a device (generally used by carpenters) that holds things firmly together

examples: come here and give me a big hug

definitions.text: secure or fasten by flattening the ends of nails or bolts
examples: The girder was clinched into the wall

definitions.text: hold a boxing opponent with one or both arms so as to prevent punches
flatten the ends (of nails and rivets)
